title: Leveling Murderer – If I Don’t Kill Someone Once a Week, I’m Going To Die, so I’d Rather Do Good Than Evil~ - Novel Updates
tags: Dark   Detectives   Game Elements   Level System   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Murders   Near-Death Experience   Schemes And Conspiracies   Serial Killers
author: コー藤真
description:
'Onizuka Yamato's level increased by 1 for killing Shinichi Gotoda.'

I'm just a company employee who happened to kill someone, and as a result, I choose to live my life by killing people and continue to raise my level.

If I'm going to kill, I'm going to kill bad guys!>
